> ## Learning Objectives
>
> * Learn what the OSC is and why you may want to use it.
> * Learn how to connect to OSC through the OnDemand portal.
> * Learn how to transfer data to and from OSC.
> * Understand the difference between login and compute nodes.
> * Understand several important options when submitting a compute job.
> * Learn about software availability at OSC.
> * Get a taste for command-line options at OSC.
